text: The Pomelo (Citrus maxima or Citrus grandis), is a citrus fruit from South East Asia. It is pale green or yellow when ripe. Its flesh is sweet and white. The rind is very thick and spongy. It is the largest citrus fruit, usually in diameter.Growing the granddaddy of grapefruit, SFGate.com, December 25, 2004 It weighs . Other names for the pomelo are pummelo and pommelo. == Other websites == * == Sources == Category:Citrus
title: Pomelo
